text: Gu vhɨra tugi vhɨrvera vov, Fhe Bakɨmen buni mbararagi phenin vherir verar gumgi gu mbigir suigav, farfa mbatɨgar mbe muuŋgi. Gu khaŋ tɨgɨp mben muuŋrim, mbe kɨr Guma Bakɨme sɨv, buni mbatɨgir ana suanga. Gu guigira mbe nzuav ndav shigap, gu mbe nzuav garav, saman ki ŋgui bakɨvir vov, mbe ndi gari. Gu ŋgɨp, mbe gangirga, gu mben suigip, zɨv, farfa mbatɨgar mben muunga.”
